thread.title: Peaceful revolution heralds change in Armenia

title: Peaceful revolution heralds change in Armenia
text:
Peaceful revolution heralds change in Armenia 9:35pm IST - 01:25
Opposition leader Nikol Pashinyan was elected Armenia's new prime minister on Tuesday, capping a peaceful revolution driven by weeks of mass protests against corruption and cronyism in the ex-Soviet republic. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Opposition leader Nikol Pashinyan was elected Armenia's new prime minister on Tuesday, capping a peaceful revolution driven by weeks of mass protests against corruption and cronyism in the ex-Soviet republic.
